935490.name: AREAZ
935490.description:
AREAZ is a true survival simulation where you rely on knowledge, awareness, and simple real-world techniques across different biomes - your area(z). The journey begins on the beach and in the jungle before leading toward the deadly mangrove swamp. Future updates expand the world with rural mainland zones, deep forests, and, finally, the cold, rocky mountain regions.

To survive, you must search every part of each area, focusing on natural resources and reading the environment carefully. Tides shift, animals follow scents, predators react to movement, and weather can turn a routine moment into danger. Calories, exhaustion, wetness, time of day, and weather all influence your chances, creating both opportunities and threats.

Crafting uses a deliberate two-hand system where stones, sticks, bamboo, and fire behave according to natural logic. AREAZ is harsh but fair—mistakes and poor resource management lead quickly to hunger or death. Only bold players who adapt and learn from nature will break through the barriers ahead and reach the next zone.
935490.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 捷克语, 意大利语, 斯洛伐克语
